ing: 2 tablespoons chopped fresh dill, or to taste
1/2 teaspoon white vinegar, or to taste
salt and black pepper to taste
des: "New twist on the traditional cucumber salad. It is a loose recipe that is really easy to make and delicious. You will love the new addition!"
ins: In a large salad bowl, stir together the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill, capers, shallot, and white vinegar until smooth. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Lightly toss cucumbers and tomatoes in the dressing until coated, and very gently stir in the smoked salmon. Refrigerate until serving time.
